title: LailaMajnu
description: The story revolves around two young lovers, Laila and Qais (Majnu), whose families oppose their relationship, leading to a passionate but ultimately doomed romance.

title: Rokstar
description: Rockstar is a 2011 Hindi romantic drama film about Janardhan Jakhar, a young man who aspires to be a rockstar and believes that pain and suffering are essential for musical creativity.

title: Andaaz apna apna
description: Andaz Apna Apna is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language comedy film about two aimless young men, Amar and Prem, who both try to marry a wealthy heiress, Raveena, to get rich quick.

title: Heeramandi
description: Heeramandi is a historical red-light district in Lahore, Pakistan, known for its grand brothels and the musical performances of courtesans.
